answers.answer: Glucose test. You drink a sugar based mixture and wait then they test your blood to see how well you are processing the sugars.
Gestational diabetes. The one hour test is given to pretty much everyone. The three hour test is given if you fail the one hour test to confirm the diagnoses.
How often do ppl fail the one hour test? Plus my doctor test my urine every time I go and I thought that was what they were testing for.

The urine test is checking sugars in the urine, protein in the urine, and hydration levels. But a blood test is far more accurate. You can choose to opt out, but there are risks with untreated GD. Do some research and figure out what you want.

question: I keep reading about a 1 hour test and a 3 hour test. What is it?
title: what is this test people keep talking about?
